content.raw:
These only seem to fail in Jenkins; they don't fail on my laptop. The console messages are slightly different now though:
~~~
173: [ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/BandwidthTest.Bandwidth/0
173: 2015-03-02 18:12:24.082 INTEGRATION_bandwidth[47183:1103] invalid drawable
173: [Msg] Waiting for master.
173: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
173: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.252
173: [Wrn] [ModelDatabase.cc:334] Getting models from[http://gazebosim.org/models/]. This may take a few seconds.
173: /Users/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/gazebo/test/ServerFixture.cc:233: Failure
173: Expected: this->server->Run() doesn't throw an exception.
173:   Actual: it throws.
173: 
173/342 Test #173: INTEGRATION_bandwidth .................................***Timeout 240.03 sec
~~~
Something in `Server::Run` is throwing an exception.
